name: Super Fish Draw
description: the draw line puzzle game is very easy and fun. After installing the game, you will find several levels on the screen. You will have to play one by one. Click on level one and start playing. This game is a pencil line game app where you will find a fish in the aquarium, and a pencil will appear when you draw a line. The hints and instructions will be on the screen. You will have just to draw a line to release water from the pipe into the aquarium, and you are good to go. Different levels will come with various obstacles. You will need to think smart to draw the line.
